Imparfait (Imperfect).Tu connaissais: You used to know, were familiar with
Imparfait (Imperfect).Il/Elle connaissait: He/She used to know, was familiar with

Imparfait (Imperfect).Ils/Elles connaissaient: They used to know, were familiar with
